oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vaccination nation? Civilised strategies for protecting outdoor poultry from Avian Flu H5N1
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sanders, Richard
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
Consumer issues
Social aspects
Health and welfare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An analysis of the threat of H5N1 Avian Flu virus to the UK, the potential impact on UK organic and free range poultry production and the evidence for a policy of vaccination.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Sanders, Richard (2006) Vaccination nation? Civilised strategies for protecting outdoor poultry from Avian Flu H5N1. Elm Farm Research Centre.
